name: MyPaintingsGallery
description: MyPaintingsGallery.com is one of the gen
overview:
MyPaintingsGallery.com(MPG) is one of the genuine Indian based paintings gallery which provides all types of paintings like abstract, Semi abstract, Landscapes Digital Paintings Ceramics, Figurative Paintings, Cityscape, Still Life and including sculptures etc. MPG has created colossal Space for art lovers and creative painters in the world. MPG is unique gallery which is created by few painters and art lovers in year 2010 and implemented on internet as an online gallery in May 2011. MPG comes in to the market with broader sense of global awareness about original handmade paintings using variety of medium like oil, water color, Pastel, tempera etc.

All the paintings provided online by MPG is meticulously checked and selected by team of Experts in this field so that customer could enjoy genuine and original art works. MPG believes in providing magnificent, high-quality Artworks to their customer so that customer could enjoy the real art while decorating their homes, offices, restaurants with their own ideas and taste. They host almost all types of Paintings using variety of mediums. Their Priority is providing hassle-free services to the customer with safe and secure transaction.

The Main mission of this online gallery is to provide opportunity to the talented contemporary artists to show their art work to whole world. They always exhibit professional artist so that customer could save their precious timing in searching beautiful Professional Artworks.

If anybody looking for 100% hand painted, museum quality paintings then MPG is of the appropriate one stop gallery where every art lover and layman could enjoy real art with great variety and genuinity. More over we can say that most of the person are in search of painting galleries only while time comes to decorate their homes, offices and restaurants etc. and This is the reason painting become main ingredient while decorating any place.

Why to opt for MypaintingsGallery.com

Easy Credit Cards Option Time Bound Delivery Guarantee 24 Hours Customer Support Genuine Handmade Paintings Offer and Discounts all the time
